about_the_game:
Affiliated Homies is a high-stakes multiplayer game where trust is a luxury you can't afford. Set in the chaotic atmospheres, players are thrusted into a deadly game of cat and mouse, where the line between friend and foe is dangerously blurred!

Two Factions, One Mission

Join the Affiliated, a group of criminals determined to protect their stolen goods, or play as an undercover cop on a daring mission to recover them. Both teams are armed to the teeth and ready for a showdown.

Intense Multiplayer Action

Engage in fast-paced, nerve-wracking gameplay with friends or players around the world. Each round brings a fresh wave of tension as you navigate the crowded party, trying to identify and eliminate your enemies.

Absurd Recoil Mechanics

Experience the thrill—and challenge—of Affiliated Homies exaggerated recoil system. Every shot counts, but managing your weapon’s kickback will test even the most seasoned players. Mastering recoil control could be the difference between life and death.

Close-Quarters Combat

Every encounter is up close and personal, where quick reflexes and sharp instincts are your best allies. Expect no mercy in these tight, claustrophobic environments where every corner could be your last.

In Affiliated Homies, every bullet has a consequence, every corner hides a threat, and every decision could be your last. Choose your side, gear up, and enter the fray—where survival is the only rule that matters. Remember, trust no one.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
